name: HioxIndia
overview:
HIOX India, one of the leading hosting and domain name providers in India, provides quality domain and hosting services at cheaper rates in the market. There are various kinds of major hosting types like Linux, Windows, Oracle, Cloud, Ruby on Rails, Silver Light, etc from which you can select the one best suited for your business. Hiox India provides shared or dedicated hosting based on the needs and requirements of the customers. You can also become a reseller in Hiox India and earn extra income while hosting for your domains.

Domain names for your website can be availed from Hiox India. Get your top level domains like .com, .net, .org, .biz, .info, .in, .co.in and lots more, at a comparatively less cost from Hiox India. You can also get Free DNS, Email, Domain forwarding along with domain registration at cheaper rates. Linux Hosting Packages comes with PHP, Perl. 99.9% server uptime, add-on domains, mail ids, cpanel webstats, mysql, php, daily backups, ftp, etc and hosting with JSP Support. We also offer affordable and reliable Linux Reseller Hosting service of Reseller account with Cpanel/ WHM (Web Host Manager). Start and host unlimited domains, create own packages, manage bandwidth, manage accounts at your ease. Hiox India has thousands of hosting customers from USA, United Kingdom, India, Canada, Singapore, Malaysia, Sri Lanka and more counties across the world.

Get quality & affordable Private Tomcat server (VPS) with 99.9% server up time from Hiox India. Dedicated JVM Web Hosting Space comes with JBoss, Tomcat, Jetty, GlassFish, custom Java Panel (NGASI Appserver Manager). You can have the ability to Restart Tomcat Server, install and manage Application servers like tomcat, jboss, jetty glassfish, change the versions of application server and JDK, check logs and upload war files.

Dedicated JVM (NGASI Application server Manager) Application server can let you manage the industry’s most comprehensive platform for developing, deploying, and integrating enterprise applications. Hiox India provides Live Media Streaming Hosting with best quality that provides uninterrupted videos live to the users with no buffer time. Live streaming is a process of broadcasting events live over the Internet. Our live stream hosting packages include streaming through shared and dedicated Red5, Wowza or FMS media servers.

HIOX India, apart from Hosting and Domain services, provides two competitive SEO plans for your website promotion also. SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is the process of improving the visibility of a website in search engines, social networking sites, etc. Promotion and optimization of your website will be carried out by a bunch of SEO professionals with vast experience.

offices.address1: No.7A-F, Ganesha Complex Campus, N.K.Palayam Road, Singanallur,
